title: Language Project Course for Integrating AI-Based Self-Regulated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and digital literacy proficiency
context.additional_context: AI tool utilization education for non-experts in limited technological environments centered around smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can understand the principles of prompt design for AI chatbots and generate questions aligned with self-regulated learning goals.
Learners can apply criteria to judge the accuracy and usefulness of AI-generated content through self-assessment.
Learners can design personalized language learning projects using AI tools and produce outcomes incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
